title: Added selection state to channeList
message:
Added selection state to channeList
However, the first item is always the selected item at startup
Since the first channel we connect to is defaulted to the currentChannel,
it's okay for the default selected item to be the first in the list
Right now we're bypassing the proper channel connection logic defined in chatFragment for testing purposes
so this won't be accurate until that is either removed, or auto startup is implemented
